name: Gender Match
description:
How would you describe YOUR gender?

If the answer is "I don't know", you're in the right place!  Gender is a complicated ball of identity and expectations, but we've got your back.

Gender match is a stress-free way to explore a variety of gender identities and labels without the hassle of hours of online searching. Go through many of the more commonly used identities and respond based on how much you relate to the label, or just how it makes you feel. 

At the end, you will have the chance to review your choices and narrow down your options!

---

This game  is intended as an experience game through which individuals who are questioning their gender or who wish to learn more about the LGBTQ+ community and the terms involved can explore terms and labels surrounding gender. I hope to create a  expandable framework through which queer people can discover terms and gauge their own identity in relation to the terms in question.

---

Credits:

A game created by Oliver Page

Project Consultant: Josh Kinchen

Many thanks to George Mason University LGBTQ Resources for their support of this project

If you would like to give feedback, you can do so here! The game is still in development, so any comments are appreciated!

https://forms.gle/7JxJBPaNKuQypmsp9

Terms defined taking reference from https://www.hrc.org/resources/glossary-of-terms  and https://www.merriam-webster.com/

Created as part of GAME599  Serious Games at GMU
